attributes.title: For TikTok😍
attributes.review: I am going to rate this app one star because even tho your president TRUMP doesn’t mean you get to cancel a whole other app jus because you don’t like it’s not all about you gotta think about other people and so we’re going to cancel your app because you wanna cancel our app😚even tho our app has been around since yours😒so yeaaa and p.s:maybe if you weren’t so mean then maybe we wouldn’t do this and if you weren’t racist and a good president maybe we wouldn’t do this sincerely,anonymous😍

attributes.title: what the heck bro?
attributes.review: I downloaded this app cause i didn’t know it existed and i wanted to see what it was, and it robbed my family! like this app straight up jumped off my phone and kicked my grandma square in the face and stole my cousins?? Why you gotta be like that Trump? Not only that but he ran into my kitchen and stole the bag of cheetos, crushed them up, and rolled around in them! So if you download this app you better be prepared to fight it, cause it will try to rob your family of their cheetos.  On another note, anyone seen my cousin??

attributes.title: dissatisfaction
attributes.review: one question. how can someone make an app THIS terrible. for one, i downloaded it because i wanted to be up to date for all of the new terrible things that the orange head had said. well as soon as i downloaded it, it immediately took my location and sent it to half of my state. various men started cat calling me over the phone and i got kidnapped. this app deserves to be taken down. now they are refusing to feed me so i have to eat beetle juice. this is an invasion of privacy. I AM NOT HAPPY 😩😤😤😫😫🤬

attributes.title: Total bummer!
attributes.review: I got the app in order to follow the POTUS and his election plans, get info, etc. But, it was crashing and making my phone go absolutely haywire!! I can stay on the app for maybe a maximum of five minutes, but any more than that, it goes absolutely crazy. And trust me, I just got a new iPhone, and it shouldn’t be doing this. The buttons in the app when I’m actually in it are very hard to interact with as well. I know I’m no young whipper-snapper, but I don’t think it’s working properly. 😕

attributes.title: God awful loading time
attributes.review: I tried signing in and it would just take forever to load. I tried redownloading twice and it still wouldn’t let me sign in. Why make an app if I can’t even use it? I thought maybe I needed to practice my patience so while I was waiting to sign in, I was streaming Chromatica by Lady Gaga and to be honest, it was a pretty good album. When I finished it, I still wasn’t signed in but at least I found my new favorite album. Again, terrible app experience.

attributes.title: I SAW DONALDS 🍤‼️
attributes.review: ‼️I didn’t download this app to get jumped scared when I open it!!! When I opened this app I saw Donald’s 🤏🏽🍤 it was so scary...I showed my mom but then I remembered she was at work so I went to kitchen to make some beats, but then I saw my dog on the roof when I looked in the oven, I jumped out the window and landed in my toilet, I talked to my sister and she told me she lost her virginity AGAIN so I ran my room, I lost my keys so I went to the police but the police arrested me for not wearing clothes, so I left my cell to go too the stor- OKAY BUT THIS APP SCARD ME THATS THE REAL PROBLEM‼️

attributes.title: worst app ever🙄😤
attributes.review: this app took FOREVER to download and when the app finally installed it deleted valuable photos in my camera roll that i won’t ever be able to get again. this app is a spam and it’ll hack into your phone😡😡😡it said that i have to vote for bunker boy in the upcoming election or else some of my only rights as a women of color will be taken away. this app also hacked my instagram and removed most of my followers🙄🙄🙄if i could give this app less than 1 star i definitely would😁

attributes.title: ~very fine people~
attributes.review: i downloaded the app because i believed our great 🇺🇸America🇺🇸 was filled with some ~very fine people~ but all i saw was some not very fine people, like Mike Pomepo🤧. anyways, the app took almost 6 hours to download because it takes so much of my phone up i had to delete ALL of my apps but thankfully mr orangeman is planning to ban tiktok anyways so that was already getting removed. but i left this one star review to show him what it’s like to lose smth he cares about🥰🤩 have a horrible day!

attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes😩❤️
attributes.review: I wish I could bleach my eyeballs after this app. Literally messed up everything. Phone keeps lagging, I can barely type this review. Also I cried myself to sleep last night because you want to delete tiktok. You don’t care about the security. Other apps have faced this problem. Tiktok has always worried about security and things like that. I think we just triggered you. Thanks bud what a great president. Anyways remember guys, black lives matter, and always will. 😼✨

attributes.title: The name game......JUDY
attributes.review: This app was HORRIBLE. When I opened the app I was teleported to Africa, AFRICA. I saw a female cactus and she told me to dunk my head in lava and spin around 5 times. After that I felt really highhhhh🤪 so I showed her the home page which consisted of a UGLY and FAT old Cheeto. Once the female cactus saw the Cheeto she threw me all the way to France where I encountered an angry bagatelle 🥖.  The angry bagatelle started LICKING my shoe. I showed the bagatelle the Cheeto 🟠 and it got even angrier so it threw me all the way to the White House——I landed in the old, ugly Cheeto’s bathroom. HE WAS IN IT. So I said....... THE NAME GAAMEEE—JUDY Judy Judy banana fana foe foony.
